content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Previously, EPAM – Internal Applications Support group supported applications developed by EPAM Systems (e.g. UPSA) or adapted for EPAM needs (e.g. JIRA) providing assistance with technical issues.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Now the responsibilities are divided between several groups.
